remarks: Version of ~ bj-isseti with a dv condition on ` x , V ` .  This proof uses only ~ df-ex , ~ ax-gen , ~ ax-4 and ~ df-clel on top of propositional calculus.  Prefer its use over ~ bj-isseti when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ).  (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:

$d A x $.
